description.jp: 人々に信仰されている「エボン教」の四老師のひとりで グアド族の長でもある実力者。生まれにより迫害された過去から「死こそが救い」という破滅的な思想を抱き その野望のためユウナを利用しようとする。
description.gl: The influential leader of the Guado and one of the four Maesters of Yevon. He holds a catastrophic belief that death is a release from the pain of existence and tries to use Yuna to fulfill that ambition.

jp.text: あまり持ち上げられると\n居心地が悪い
それでも舞台に立つのが\n役者のつとめ
あなたは私を裁きに来たのか
そのひたむきなまなざし\n実に美しい
すべての命が滅びれば\nすべての苦痛も……\nまた 癒える
悲しみは消えはしない

gl.text: Must I always endure such praise?
Even so、 the actors must play their parts.
You came to punish me、 then.
Your eyes、 they burn with resolve... Beautiful.
If all life were to end...all suffering would end.

desc.gl:
6-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 8 turns 1 level of Seymour's Repose (limit 3)
Limit that stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV increases with Seymour's Repose level
Triggers following action if target's HP 80% of MAX HP or less after use:
 4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
 Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
 Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Further triggers following action if target's HP 30% of MAX HP or less:
 Increases BRV based on ATK
 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
 Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
 Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

desc.en:
「Chainspell」 use +2

When using 「Chainspell」: 
- Becomes 2-HIT magic BRV + HP attack executed twice
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Inflicts 「Initial BRV Down」 for 5 turns upon the initial HP Attack
- Slightly improves 「Max BRV Up」 and extends its duration by 2 turns
- If target is below 80% Max HP, triggers an additional 「Chainspell」

While buffed:
- Turns「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
　∟ Greater BRV Damage to debuffed targets
desc.gl:
Chainspell use +2

When using Chainspell:
 • 2-hit magic BRV attack becomes 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Target: 5 turns INT BRV Down II from first HP attack
 • 6 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up
 • Triggers additional Chainspell if target's HP 80% of MAX HP or less after use; triggered Chainspell will not trigger another even if triggering conditions are met

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets) with active buff
desc.jp:
「連続魔」の使用回数＋2

「連続魔」使用時
・2HIT魔法BRV攻撃が
　2HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・最初のHP攻撃時に
　対象に5ACTION「初期BRV中ダウン」付与
・自身に4ACTION「最大BRVアップ」付与の
　効果小アップを追加し さらに2ACTION期間延長
・使用後 ターゲットのHPが最大HPの80％以下の時
　追加で「連続魔」が発動
　追加発動した「連続魔」で条件を満たしても
　追加で「連続魔」は発動しない

short_desc.gl: Maester of Yevon Buff Starting & Requiem Buff Longer Starting: Boost to Requiem

name.jp: レクイエムフォースチェイン

desc.en:
When using 「Requiem」:
- Moderately raises BRV potency
- If target is below 80% Max HP, triggers the following attack
　∟ 4-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Greater BRV Damage to debuffed targets
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
- Furthermore, if the target is below 30% Max HP, triggers the following attack
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack, followed by 2-HIT magic BRV + HP Attack executed twice
　∟ Greater BRV Damage to debuffed targets
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Requiem:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Triggers following action if target's HP 80% of MAX HP or less after use:
 • 4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
 • Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Further triggers following action if target's HP 30% of MAX HP or less:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
 • Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
「レクイエム」使用時
・BRV威力中アップ
・使用後 ターゲットのHPが最大HPの80％以下の時
　以下の行動が追加発動
　-4HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・さらに ターゲットのHPが最大HPの30％以下の時
　以下の行動が追加発動
　-自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算後
　　2HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行う
　-弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
